archetype_name: Family Heat Lovers: Korean & Latin American Feasts (Hot, 30–60, Advanced)
name: Gochujang-Habanero Chicken Skewers with Pineapple-Corn Salsa, Scallion Rice, and Quick Cucumber Pickles
description: Grilled gochujang-marinated chicken skewers bring Korean heat, paired with a bright pineapple-corn salsa and scallion jasmine rice, plus crisp cucumber pickles for contrast.
prep_steps: If using wooden skewers, soak 8–10 in water for 15 minutes.
Rinse 2 cups jasmine rice under cold water until it runs mostly clear; drain.
Cut 800 g chicken thighs into 3 cm pieces.
Make marinade: in a bowl, mix 3 tbsp gochujang, 1 tbsp honey, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1 tbsp olive oil, juice of 1 lime, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper.
Toss chicken in marinade; set aside 15–20 minutes.
Dice 2 cups pineapple, finely chop 1 small red onion, and chop 1/2 cup coriander.
Char-corn prep: drain 2 cups corn and pat dry.
Make salsa mix-in: finely chop 1–2 jalapenos (or to heat preference).
Slice 1 large cucumber into thin rounds.
Quick pickle: in a small bowl, mix 1/3 cup rice vinegar, 2 tsp sugar, 1/2 tsp salt; add cucumber and toss. Chill.
Slice 4 spring onion thinly (whites and greens) for rice.
Preheat outdoor grill to medium-high heat. Set a stovetop pan ready for rice and a skillet for charring corn.
cook_steps: Rice: add rinsed jasmine rice and 3 cups water with 1/2 tsp salt to a pot. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce to low, and cook 12 minutes. Rest off heat 10 minutes.
Char the corn in a hot dry skillet over medium-high, stirring until lightly blistered (3–5 minutes). Transfer to a bowl to cool slightly.
Salsa: combine charred corn, diced pineapple, half of the chopped red onion, chopped coriander, chopped jalapenos, juice of 1/2 lime, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1/4 tsp salt. Mix and set aside.
Thread marinated chicken onto soaked skewers.

Grill skewers over direct heat, turning every 2–3 minutes, until nicely charred and cooked through (internal temp 74°C/165°F), about 10–12 minutes total. Brush any leftover marinade on during the first few turns only.
Fluff rice; fold in sliced spring onion and a squeeze of lime to taste.
Taste salsa and pickles; adjust salt or lime if needed.
Serve: plate scallion rice, top with chicken skewers. Spoon pineapple-corn salsa over or alongside. Add a mound of quick cucumber pickles on the side.
